dict.string: GutCheck uses your health data to provide personalized nutrition insights and help identify food triggers that may affect your digestive health.
GutCheck saves your meal nutrition and symptom data to the Health app to help you track patterns and share with healthcare providers.
GutCheck uses your camera to scan food barcodes for accurate nutrition data and estimate portion sizes using advanced scanning technology.
GutCheck can save meal photos to your photo library to help you visually track your food intake and portion sizes.
GutCheck sends you helpful reminders to log meals and symptoms so you can maintain consistent tracking for better health insights.
GutCheck can optionally use your location to suggest nearby restaurants and provide contextual meal logging when dining out.
